original: Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca
